original_text: Abram brought all these to him, cut them in two and arranged the halves opposite each other; the birds, however, he did not cut in half.
korean_text: 아브람이 그 모든 것을 가져다가 그 중간을 쪼개고 그 쪼갠 것을 마주 대하여 놓고 그 새는 쪼개지 아니하였으며

sentences.original_text: Abram brought all these to him
sentences.korean_translation: 아브람은 이 모든 것을 그에게 가져왔으며

sentences.original_text: and arranged the halves opposite each other
the birds, however, he did not cut in half
